Introduction: Oh, hey! You're that new farmer!$h#$e#You can call me Zech.
spring_Mon: In a fantasy setting, I think I'd be a dwarf.#$e#I'm not really sure why.#$b#I just think they're neat.#$e#Too bad dwarves aren't real.
spring_Tue: I know some good hiking trails around here.#$b#I make an effort to see something new at least once a month.
spring_Wed: Mustard is the best condiment. No contest.#$e#It goes well with so many things!#$e#You're a mustard denier. I know it. I can see it in your eyes.
spring_Thu: Have you met my sister Ana?#$b#She's pretty passionate about everything.#$b#But I think that's why everyone likes her so much.$h
spring_Fri: Hey, @.#$e#Since I've learned how to prepare vegetables, I've really gained a whole new appreciation for them.
spring_Sun: Maybe I should take up mountain biking.#$e#That could be me.#$e#Mountain biker Zech.
summer_Mon: If you ever find yourself gambling, go for the blackjack table.#$e#It's your best odds. Trust me.
summer_Tue: Man, it's hot out!$s#$b#I should probably take off my coat.
summer_Thu: That girl Haley.#$b#She kind of scares me.$s
summer_Fri: I tried to take up fishing.#$b#It was okay.#$e#Kind of boring, if I'm honest.#$e#I'm not into it like Willy is.
summer_Sat: Nothing manlier than grilling meat in the summer.#$b#Except for maybe emotional vulnerability.#$e#Real men cry when they need to and rely on their friends for support.
summer_Sun: I don't bother recycling anymore.#$b#It all ends up in a landfill anyways.
fall_Mon: This country doesn't take care of its veterans.#$b#It sickens me.$s
fall_Wed: My brother Jake is pretty nerdy.#$b#I usually think myself as being pretty nerdy,#$b#But Jake? He takes the cake.$h
fall_Thu: Is Lewis affiliated with a political party?
fall_Fri: Ross always makes the awfulest puns.#$e#What a guy.$h
fall_Sat: Sometimes it feels like all of my friends like to play farming sims.#$b#Can you imagine?
fall_Sun: George is such a grumpy old man.#$e#It's the best.$h#$b#I could listen to him all day.$h
winter_Tue: I friggin' love my wife.$h#$b#She's always there for me when I need her.$h#$b#She's just the best, man.$h
winter_Wed: I'm roasting porkchops tonight!$h#$e#I'm excited.#$b#They're going to be glazed and everything.$h
winter_Thu: I'm jealous of Jake's beard.$s#$e#Don't tell Jake I said that.
winter_Fri: I wrote a book once. It's called "The Lords of 10ckn3g0r."#$b#Shelby's book club has been reading it lately.#$b#It's kind of embarrassing...$s#$b#But also very flattering.$h
winter_Sat: Sometimes Shelby will just run into the night.#$e#Especially after a night of drinking.#$b#It's exhausting chasing after her all the time.$s
winter_Sun: Ugh, my nose is running.$s#$b#I better not be catching a cold.$s
